title: Holy shit, I forgot about his show.
body:
Jackie Chan Adventures... I watched that every single Thursday when I visited my grandmother after school. I compeltely forgot about for the last couple years. It was like Xaiolin Showdown but it had Jackie Chan so it was immediately better. 

http://static.tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pub/images/jackie_chan_adventures.jpg


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GIh_SjPsGgw
